name: Apothecary (Ryoma Marta-Sugawara)
description:
Cure patients with your potions!
Best if run in full screen.
NOTE: Music plays on launch.

Controls:
Mouse- Select Buttons
Q/W/E- Switch Rooms

Credits:
Ryoma M.S. (@ryomams)- Lead Programmer, Designer & Artist
Jack Campbell (@jackcampbell)- UI Programmer & Designer
Aidan Cannon (@aidanisntfunny)- Designer, Artist, & Sound Designer

A Construct 3 game made for Tad Leckman's CMPM 80K (Intro to Game Design) class at UCSC, Spring Quarter 2020.
